verses.name: Jeremiah 39:15
verses.text: Now the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah, while he was shut up in the court of the prison, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 39:16
verses.text: Go and speak to Ebed–melech the Ethiopian, saying, Thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will bring my words upon this city for evil, and not for good; and they shall be accomplished in that day before thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 39:17
verses.text: But I will deliver thee in that day, saith the Lord: and thou shalt not be given into the hand of the men of whom thou art afraid.
